review: Works amazingly well.  When you first plug it in, it took about 2 hours to finally be able to gain access to Netflix.  I use the power adapter that comes with it.  Apparently that makes it more reliable, but I haven't had any issues.  Everything streams very quickly and in HD quality.  Access to Netflix, Amazon, games, apps and PandoraThe only thing I wish it had was a lanyard and maybe a colorful button or at least the Amazon logo written on it because the remote is very small and lightweight and it's black.  So I've lost it multiple times from the kids misplacing it or slipping between the couch cushions.I don't typically take time to put in reviews, but I've been raving about this to all the people I work with and my friends.  For $40, it's definitely worth it!
